title: Tenacious

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Once the rolelist has been rolled by the host, if Tenacious was rolled, before the roles are given out, 3 other roles must be rerolled into non mafia killing roles, UNLESS the rolelist already has guaranteed Evil Faction slots.
-Once you are the last mafia standing, your Factional Mafia Kill Is an Unstoppable Rampaging attack.
-Players will know at the start of the day when a Tenacious Is the last mafia standing.
